name: JSC BeSmart
description:
We create quality mobile apps for all popular platforms (iOS, Android, Windows Phone, watchOS, and Android Wear) as well as back-end applications to serve them.

Whether you are a startup or a global enterprise we are dedicated to making your app meet your expectations.
 
Visit our website to learn more and feel free to give us an overview of your project - be it just an idea for an app or detailed requirements and specification - we’ll provide our free non-binding proposal for your review.
JSC BeSmart is a software company which provides automatization solutions to top banks of the Republic of Belarus for past 20 years and offers outsourcing services in field of mobile applications development.
